Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 30th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1969...
Injured on 8/19/1969 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 6/25/1970 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 7/14/1972 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 9 weeks...
Traded from Baltimore to New York (A) on 1/31/1973 (Going to NYY: P J. Bell. Going to BAL: P D. Morris, RF J. Clark)...
Injured on 5/28/1973 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/8/1973 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from New York (A) to Baltimore on 4/18/1975 (Going to NYY: P B. Smith. Going to BAL: P J. Bell, P G. Ross)...
Earned first career win on 4/28/1975...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/6/1984 to a 2-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Injured on 4/26/1984 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1985...
Injured on 6/15/1985 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/18/1987 with a Bruised Hand, out for 5 days...
Injured on 7/19/1988 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 7-8 weeks...
Injured on 5/29/1989 with a Bruised Foot, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/16/1990, off Lee Guetterman (CHC)...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1990...
Injured on 8/29/1991 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1991...
Hit first career homerun on 8/6/1993, off Kevin Foster (PIT)...
